instructions.reason_for_call: You want to change your wireless earbuds in order W5061109 to a blue colored one. Provide all details upfront and ask the agent to resolve as soon as possible. You want the price to be the same or lower.
instructions.known_info: You are Chen Johnson from Houston TX, 77004.
instructions.unknown_info: You do not remember your email address

messages.content: Hi! How can I help you today?

Hello! I recently ordered wireless earbuds with the order number W5061109, but I would like to change them to a blue-colored pair instead. Could you please help me with this change? I would prefer the price to be the same or lower. My name is Chen Johnson, and I'm from Houston, TX, 77004. Thank you!

message.content: Hello! I recently ordered wireless earbuds with the order number W5061109, but I would like to change them to a blue-colored pair instead. Could you please help me with this change? I would prefer the price to be the same or lower. My name is Chen Johnson, and I'm from Houston, TX, 77004. Thank you!

Thanks — I found your order #W5061109 (status: pending). Before I can make any change I need your explicit confirmation. Please review the modification details below and reply yes/no or give the requested info.

Summary of current order (relevant line):
- Item to change: Wireless Earbuds
  - current item_id: 3694871183
  - color: white
  - price: 256.67

What I need from you (pick one option and confirm):
1) Confirm you want to swap item_id 3694871183 → a blue variant. If you already have the blue item_id, reply with the new item_id.  
OR  
2) If you don’t know the blue item_id, confirm I may select a blue variant for you that is the same price or cheaper than 256.67.

Also confirm:
- Payment method to use for any price difference: I will use the same method on file (paypal_3742148) unless you tell me otherwise.

Important notes (please acknowledge):
- Modifying items on a pending order can only be done once. Make sure this change includes all item edits you want.
- I will proceed only after you explicitly confirm (yes) to the exact change and payment choice.

How would you like to proceed?
